billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Relates to extending authorization for additional sales tax in the county of Schoharie until 2013
summary: Relates to extending authorization for additional sales tax in the county of Schoharie until 2013.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization for imposition of additional sales tax in the county of Schoharie
